entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy. High 13.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy with risk of a thunderstorm. Local amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:39 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
